name: PubHell
description:
On PubHell, you will play as a former bartender who died recently. 

Because he was odious with his clients, he was send to hell.

His cycle of torture force him to serve as many demon disguised as client every 10 seconds, for ethernity !

Some say that there is an escape of hell... Who knows...

Game made during the Ludum Dare 51 - From October 1st 2022 to October 3rd 2022

Contribution

Vasguen VARDANIAN - UI Designer / Sound Designer / Programmer

Kelian AUFFRET - Game Designer

Carla MALERGUE - 2D Artist / Character Designer / 2D Animation

Adeline LEPERRE - 2D Artist

Patrick MASSENA - UI Designer / Programmer
